projects: [{"title":"Parallel MAPsort and Parallel QuickSort using pThreads, OpenMP and MPI","start_date":"Jul 2012","end_date":"Nov 2012","description":"•Guidance :- Dr. Gaurav Trivedi, Assistant Professor, EEE Dept.
